home.title: Chealt.com
home.mainDescription: This application helps you stay healthy and happy. Look around, you might see something useful.
home.privacyDescription: All the data you enter into the application is stored on your device. There are no cookies, third-party integrations, or anything like that. If there is a feature that requires you to send some data somewhere, we will always ask for your permission and let you know about the consequences.
home.improvementsDescription: If you have an idea how to make this app even more useful, let us know <1>here</2> by creating a <3>GitHub issue</4>.

checkUps.title: Check-ups & Medical Tests
checkUps.tagInstructions: Your Check-ups and medical tests will be shown here. Just tag your document with one of the following: <1>{{tags}}</1>.

notFound.title: Could not find the page you were looking for.
